name: Grasshopper All-Stars Killer Badminton
description:
Based on the real-life badminton adventures of Goichi Suda (CEO and founder of Grasshopper Manufacture), Grasshopper All-Stars Killer Badminton plucks your favorite faces from past Grasshopper titles and plops them in an all new,  all-ages sports spectacular!

The game is truly free-to-play. No ads. No in-app purchases. No tricks! Consider it a thank you to all our fans who have supported us over the years. 

So what are you waiting for? With two playable characters to start, and more to be added to the roster in the months ahead, there's no better time than now to pick up your racket and take a swing for the #1 spot!

(Soundtrack by Magic Man Tony Astro) 

tonyastro.bandcamp.com/album/killer-badminton-direct-audio…

https://youtube.com/watch?v=bG5jp5Ruzs0…
